tool.name: SBOL Converter: FASTA to SBOL3

param.label: Namespace URL
param.help: Namespace URL, required for conversions from FASTA. Default=https://synbiohub.org/public/igem

tool.help:
SBOL Converter: FASTA TO SBOL3 ================================
Convert FASTA file to SBOL3.
Input ----- Required:
* **INPUT_FILE**\ : FASTA input file. * **Namespace URL**\ : Namespace URL, required for conversions from Fasta. Default=https://synbiohub.org/public/igem"
Output ------ * **OUTPUT_FILE**\ : SBOL3 output file in NT format.
Project Links ------------------ * `GitHub <https://github.com/SynBioDex/SBOL-utilities>`_
License ------- * `MIT <https://github.com/SynBioDex/SBOL-utilities/blob/develop/LICENSE.txt>`_
